originalText.text: Dr Spiera is one of the best doctors I've ever seen, and as a person with a chronic illness I've seen a lot. He is very kind and understanding and has a better bedside manner than most doctors. He is exceptionally knowledgeable and actually takes the time to explain things thoroughly. He takes his time with you, which is rare these days with doctors.

originalText.text: Dr Spiera is one of the best doctors I have ever come across. The office staff is fine and not rude. It's just a busy office and sometimes you need a little patients that all. Keep up the great work

originalText.text: I was Jenny Diep’s  patient for 11 years. Always found her to be super competent and professional.   A good doctor, Nice person who called you back and cared about a patient.  Sorry to hear she’s leaving.

text.text: I was Jenny Diep’s  patient for 11 years. Always found her to be super competent and professional.   A good doctor, Nice person who called you back and cared about a patient.  Sorry to hear she’s leaving.

originalText.text: 6 months and I haven't heard about my exams results till now. Many calls, almost never an answer, and when there was someone to reply I received the worst possible attitude on the phone. The only thing I have received from them was multiple mails telling me I owed them $30 (!),  what I repeatedly said I would do as soon as I had the exams results or any word from the "doctor" about it... nothing till now. I am sorry I cannot give zero stars...

originalText.text: The doctor is fine but the staff is lazy, unresponsive, and uncaring. Constantly not refilling my wife's prescriptions to the detriment of her health!
